entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Bridgetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 p.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.1Â°C

Condition: Light Rain

Visibility: 16 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets at times mixed with rain beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Rain along parts of the coast overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Rain along parts of the coast early in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
